page.title: 19HOUSES(2).
page.content: Most houses in the Easthorpe area are owned by their occupants.Easthorpe village is a more interesting area than Easthorpe. Bell house was a former pub and it dates back to the roundheads period. Onslow cottages were being built between the first world war,and during the beginning of the war the building was stopped by the council and was started again in 1940.The local pub in Easthorpe is 400 years old and used to be a shop.We also went to the O.K.cafe and interviewed the daughter of the owner and asked her how old the cafe was and the answer was 40 years old.Situated at the side of the A12 there is a kennels and the house was built in 1940.The man that lives there has dogs and the house has two big living rooms.
